name: Root Knight: Defense of the Spiritual Tree
name_original: Root Knight: Defense of the Spiritual Tree
description: Glasir Forest is in danger. 1000 years passed, and the powers of the spiritual tree began to wane once more. During the impending invasion of an outer species, a mysterious hero will fight to protect his home and become a member of the Knights of the Square Root. Root Knight: defense of the spiritual tree tells the story of a little protector with big aspirations.
